title: Lyft: Deep into the l5kit library
description: Lyft: Deep into the l5kit library The image from L5Kit official document: http://www.l5kit.org/README.html Continued from the previous kernel Lyft: Comprehensive guide to start competition. In this kernel, I will look into the raw data structures and l5kit library in more detail with code reading. After understanding these, I hope you can arrange the data by yourself to build a better pipleline for motion prediction. Table of Contents 1. Understanding Rasterizer class   2. Understanding EgoDataset/AgentDataset class   3. Understanding raw data structures  The first part is same with previous kernel, please jump to 1. Understanding Rasterizer class for the main topic of this kernel.
